cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence

Class WavePropagationFunction<T extends Location>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence.WavePropagationFunction<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of object that will be passed during propagation. (an object that we are doing the propagation for)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BotFunction<java.lang.Integer,T>, PropagationFunction<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreepFarmingInfluence, EnemyCreepInfluence, EnemyHeroInfluence, EnemyTowerInfluencePropagation

    public class WavePropagationFunction<T extends Location>
extends java.lang.Object
implements PropagationFunction<T>
    This is a representation of "bfs" like propagation function. It should spread to some distance regarding obstacles and with given falloff.
    Author:
    kocur
